title: Shooting at Kokomo bar sends 4 people to the hospital
content:
INDIANAPOLIS, Ind. (June 15, 2014) — Police officers in Kokomo are investigating a shooting at a bar that sent 4 people to the hospital on Sunday, according to Howard County dispatch.
It happened around 3:15 a.m. at The Ultimate Place 2 B Bar on 5126 Clinton Drive.
The condition of the victims is unknown.
Fox59 will continue to update this story as we learn more.
